main event: An unidentified flying object described as a flaming missile was reported over Mexico Beach, Florida on November 30, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bright orange-red glow and hovering at approximately 200 feet before rapidly accelerating away., Multiple witnesses included local civilians and military personnel., The site was subjected to thorough searches but yielded no physical evidence., Distinct meteorological conditions were recorded during the sighting period., The case remains classified as unidentified despite the conclusion suggesting it may have been a balloon or aircraft.
